attributes.action: Extend Prison Sentences to Convicted Peadophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British Public think it is an Outrage that Convicted & Re-offending Peadophiles recieve such short prison sentences. 

Given the damage the Abuse causes to the Children & Families involved we feel the Punishments do not fit! 

Society has had enough of Peadophiles escaping Lengthy Prison Terms for their Discusting Crimes towards Our Children. 

There seems to be NO Deterrent  for these People as the punishment is often less severe than Petty Crimes. 

Please Address this Issue, We turn to you & Plead for the Protection of Britain's Children...

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the Courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
